name: For Double
description:
You play as random figures who ended up in the hell of figurative madness, every corner and every part of the wall is a threat, all platforms are in constant motion and add even more chaos to all this madness, and the timer in the game will show how long you last.

For Double is a side-view game where the player controls rectangular figures, dodging dangerous figures, jumping on platforms that randomly change and move, the game has the possibility of a competitive game for two.

Game Features:
- Visual style
- Game for two
- Difficulty
